00035 namespace pwiz {
00036 namespace data {
00037 
00038 
00039 typedef SampleDatum< double, std::complex<double> > FrequencyDatum;
00040 
00041 
00042 /// Class for binary storage of complex frequency data.
00043 
00044 /// Stores raw frequency-domain data, as well as meta-data.  Also includes
00045 /// basic access and analysis functions.
00046 
00047 class PWIZ_API_DECL FrequencyData
00048 {
00049     public:
00050 
00051     /// \name types
00052     //@{
00053         enum PWIZ_API_DECL IOMode {Binary, Text, Automatic};
00054         typedef std::vector<FrequencyDatum> container;
00055         typedef container::iterator iterator;
00056         typedef container::const_iterator const_iterator;
00057     //@}
00058 
00059     /// \name instantiation
00060     //@{
00061         FrequencyData();
00062         FrequencyData(const std::string& filename, IOMode mode=Automatic);
00063         FrequencyData(const FrequencyData& that, const_iterator begin, const_iterator end);
00064         FrequencyData(const FrequencyData& that, const_iterator center, int radius);
00065         ~FrequencyData();
00066     //@}
00067 
00068     /// \name I/O
00069     //@{
00070         void read(const std::string& filename, IOMode mode=Automatic);
00071         void read(std::istream& is, IOMode mode=Binary);
00072         void write(const std::string& filename, IOMode mode=Binary) const;
00073         void write(std::ostream& os, IOMode mode=Binary) const;
00074     //@}
00075 
00076     /// \name data access
00077     //@{
00078         /// const access to underlying data
00079         const container& data() const;
00080 
00081         /// non-const access to underlying data -- must call analyze() to recache after any changes
00082         container& data();
00083     //@}
00084 
00085     /// \name metadata
00086     //@{
00087         int scanNumber() const;
00088         void scanNumber(int value);
00089 
00090         double retentionTime() const;
00091         void retentionTime(double value);
00092 
00093         const CalibrationParameters& calibrationParameters() const;
00094         void calibrationParameters(const CalibrationParameters& cp);
00095 
00096         double observationDuration() const;
00097         void observationDuration(double value);
00098 
00099         double noiseFloor() const;
00100         void noiseFloor(double value);
00101     //@}
00102 
00103     /// \name data transformation 
00104     //@{
00105         /// transform all underlying data: (x,y) -> (x+shift,y*scale)
00106         void transform(double shift, std::complex<double> scale); 
00107 
00108         /// return current shift of data (compared to original)
00109         double shift() const;
00110 
00111         /// return current scale of data (compared to original)
00112         std::complex<double> scale() const;
00113 
00114         /// normalize by transform( -max.x, 1/abs(max.y) ) 
00115         void normalize();
00116 
00117         /// addition
00118         void operator+=(const FrequencyData& that);
00119     //@}
00120 
00121     /// \name analysis
00122     //@{
00123         /// recache statistics calculations after any direct data changes via non-const data() 
00124         void analyze();
00125 
00126         /// returns an iterator to FrequencyDatum with highest magnitude
00127         const_iterator max() const;
00128 
00129         double mean() const;
00130         double meanSquare() const;
00131         double sumSquares() const;
00132         double variance() const;
00133 
00134         /// special calculation of noise floor for data with zero holes,
00135         /// e.g. data obtained from RAW file m/z-intensity pairs
00136         double cutoffNoiseFloor() const;
00137 
00138         /// calculation of the observation duration from the data
00139         double observationDurationEstimatedFromData() const;
00140     //@}
00141 
00142     /// \name auxilliary
00143     //@{
00144         /// Finds the FrequencyDatum nearest the desired frequency.
00145         const_iterator findNearest(double frequency) const;
00146     //@}
00147 
00148     /// \name auxilliary functions
00149     //@{
00150         /// Returns a <frequency,magnitude> pair.
00151         static std::pair<double,double> magnitudeSample(const FrequencyDatum& datum);
00152     //@}
00153 
00154     private:
00155     struct Impl;
00156     std::auto_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00157 
00158     /// Hidden to prevent unintended copying of large amounts of data.
00159     FrequencyData(FrequencyData& that);
00160 
00161     /// Hidden to prevent unintended copying of large amounts of data.
00162     FrequencyData& operator=(FrequencyData& that);
00163 };
00164

00166 } // namespace data
